meanings.definition: A number of things of the same kind, growing or situated close together.
meanings.sent1: The setts of flowers in the garden created a beautiful display.
meanings.sent2: The setts of houses in the neighborhood gave it a cozy feel.
meanings.sent3: The setts of ducks waddling in a line looked like a parade.
meanings.sent4: The setts of stars in the night sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent5: The setts of books on the shelf made it look organized.

meanings.definition: A hard paving material made of small pieces of stone.
meanings.sent1: The pathway was constructed using setts, giving it a rustic look.
meanings.sent2: The historic town square was paved with setts for a classic feel.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to bury its acorn in the setts.
meanings.sent4: The setts on the driveway glistened after the rain, resembling jewels.
meanings.sent5: The setts on the patio provided a sturdy surface for outdoor dining.
